scene_description: Astronaut discovering ancient alien artifact on Mars at sunset

structured_prompt.short_description: A 42-year-old male astronaut standing in a Martian landscape, holding an ancient alien artifact, illuminated by a warm orange sunset glow, captured with a soft diffused side light at eye level

objects.description: A 42-year-old male astronaut, wearing a pristine white and orange NASA-issue spacesuit with a gold helmet under his arm, the suit's texture a mix of glossy and matte finishes, with a utility belt around his waist and a communication device on his chest, short light brown hair visible under the helmet's rim, bright blue eyes with a hint of excitement, a small scar above his left eyebrow from a previous mission, a fit and athletic build, standing approximately 5'10" with an upright posture, leaning forward slightly with his right hand grasping a strange, ancient alien artifact and his left hand resting on his knee, oriented at a three-quarter turn to the camera, the Martian sunset casting a warm orange glow on his suit, a silver watch on his left wrist, and a pair of high-tech, silver-rimmed glasses perched on his forehead
objects.texture: glossy and matte finishes, fabric, and skin
objects.appearance_details: pristine spacesuit, utility belt, and communication device
objects.pose: leaning forward with right hand grasping artifact and left hand on knee

structured_prompt.negative_prompt: blurry, low quality, deformed, disfigured, bad anatomy, extra limbs, mutation

simple_prompt: A 42-year-old male astronaut standing in a Martian landscape, holding an ancient alien artifact, illuminated by a warm orange sunset glow, captured with a soft diffused side light at eye level
